extendedInfo.description: Do you enjoy surfing and being updated with the ASP World Tour? Get all the latest surfing related news on your Android! Functionality:-Read all the latest asp surfing news-Check out rankings and schedules-Notifications-WidgetsDisclaimer: This is an unofficial app that was created only by me ( Christian GÃ¶llner ) using the public RSS feed provided by www.aspworldtour.com. Since I'm a surfer I decided to create this app for me and all the other surfers around the world.Enjoy!Currently showing news of the Billabong Pro Tahiti event!Libraries used: ActionBarSherlock, NineOldAndroids, OkHttp, Picasso, Jsoup and Crashlytics

reviews.title: Very cool app!
reviews.comment: Nice clear and functional,  you get updates about what\'s going on in yhe industry of surfing right from the siurce! Haveused it for a week now and have not detectedany bugs or anything.  Thanks to the developer,  keep riding!
reviews.author: Er Monterro

reviews.title: Great app for surf fans
reviews.comment: Latest changes have made this a very handy app for checking asp news.
reviews.author: Dean Spinks

reviews.title: Get your updates
reviews.comment: Great for keeping up with the Guys
reviews.author: IVAN NORWAY

reviews.title: All the info I need and follows Googles design to a tee!
reviews.comment: Feels like its actually a Google app.
reviews.author: Nic DiPace

reviews.title: New update
reviews.comment: This new update is awesome !! Keep it up !!
reviews.author: Christian krebs rempel

reviews.title: Good... But
reviews.comment: These new notifications are annoying. Uninstallig because it only stops the notifications if I click on the article
reviews.author: Graeme Cox

reviews.title: Excellent
reviews.comment: Obviously the source of news is good, so content is good. The app is so well put together, particularly good since the last update that brought notifications and a nice new design. It\'s smooth too.
reviews.author: Stephen Rainey

reviews.title: 10 stars
reviews.comment: This new update makes an already great app into an excellent app. I didn\'t follow Surf in a regular basis but this app helped me grow my desire to follow the World Tour. It has every info I could possibly think about at the tip of my fingers without the need of using the browser. The UI is just gorgeous and makes everything so simple and so intuitive.   If you like Surf, just get this app. How is this even free?
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome
reviews.comment: Was hoping this app would get the jellybean treatment. Good job
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Works perfectly with my htc wildfire
reviews.author: A Google User
